comments.author: Eearslya.6309
comments.body: It’s been requested, and it might become a feature someday, but at the moment, no.

comments.author: Kay Hude.2910
comments.body:
Hi.
Looking at the Wiki, I did not see anything that could fit, so I ask here:

Is there a way to list the items that are “stored” in the TP? I mean items that were bought but not picked up yet.
Same thing for gold from items that have been sold.

Thanks,
—kay
